features: 【Multi-Function Microphone】The 5-in-1 toy microphone for kids can be used as karaoke mic, Bluetooth speaker, FM radio,voice changer and recorder. Portable and awesome for singing at anywhere.
【18 Classic Kid Songs】This kids karaoke microphone includes a TF card that has 18 pre-loaded kid songs like Five Little Ducks,Jingle Bells,Bingo and more. Enjoy your music time at anytime.

【Easy Connection Ways】It can be easily connected with smartphone,tablet or other devices via Bluetooth.Just turn on the mic and switch to Buletooth mode,then find "WS-858" on your phone,and click to pair it.
【Surprisingly Sound Effect】The portable microphone for kids adults with 3-layers noise reduction, Hi-Fi stereo sound and echo function.You can also change your voice to 4 funny magic sound effects.

【Ideal Gifts for Kids】A better toy gifts for 3-12 year old girls boys.Suitable for all types of festival such as Christmas, Birthday, Thanksgiving, etc.When your children open it, there must be a big smile on their face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the one folks, best value and quality for the $$$$
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for a friends twin daughters. To be sure it was ready to go I charged it and tested the functionality. It connected to BT seamlessly, the built-in audio quality was exceptional on the mic considering the cost and the build quality was also impressive for the price.My friends girls have been playing with it non-stop for day's now, even Mom and Dad are enjoying it. Anyway, my 16 y/o daughter wanted one for her TikTok stuff so I foolishly ordered another brand that looked very similar thinking they were all the same. Bad move, JUNK, sound is awful, barely amplified, defective BT and the lights only worked in one mode. A return has already been initiated, the two are not created equally.Sooooo, if you are looking for a GREAT karaoke mic, latest version BT, great sound, lights, etc.....look no further, this is the best mic for the $$$$$ right now. Very impressive especially when compared to another that was highly rated and looked much the same. Trust me, just buy this one, no need to spend $30-$40 on the other more popular brands, this one is perfect for the price.....hopefully they will hold up long term, i'll report back once we've had it for a few months. Bottom line is it's still a child's toy but what a fun toy it is and for the price you just can't beat what it can do and how it performs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WoW! The price, the quality… the value!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two of these to give to family and I just opened one to show how it works and I was blown away! This is impressive for the price… I’d buy again for friends & Fam!The magic button has funny voice changers; flea, high & low voice, etc. I haven’t tried the voice remove function yet but this is great for a family gathering as a microphone for announcements & for some karaoke fun.Buy it, kids AND adults will be impressed and they will love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun for kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, turns on extra loud. and Wheels on the bus says round drowned, but is loved
reviews.reviewText: My girls are obsessed and they use it all the time. I love that the songs are preloaded and easy to use. There are a few things that are important to know.First, would I buy it again? Yes, BUT, when you turn it on it auto turns on at the loudest setting, even if it was turned off at the lower setting. It also has a few incorrect words including the wheels on the bus song it says "the wheels on the bus go round and drowned", over and over and drowned is very pronounced (louder and more forceful than the rest of the song) which sounds morbid when you are listening to it. My girls think it is funny and we talked about it, BUT it isn't ideal in the least and I would look for another one if I felt confident that another would work as well but have the words correctly, even for a higher price. We had tried a different brand and had to return it twice because one wouldn't charge, and the other would randomly turn off after a minute or two. So for the price it is a good option.Lastly, it isn't the sturdiest of toys. Considering it is made for little ones, my 5 year old accidentally dropped it on our rug and the microphone top popped off. I hot glued it back together and it still works, but I was surprised at how easily it broke.All in all, for the price it's what we wanted. The microphone works well, the songs are preloaded and it holds a charge.
